unnormalised: Boro, tumi Indian Railways-an ravanchi yevzonn kortat, tem bore! Zaitea lokank tacher prashn asat, mhunn hanv mhozo anubhav vanttum Bharatant train-an ravon.
normalised: Boro, mhunnlear tum Indian Railways-anlean provas korcheak yevzon kortai, tem borem! Zaitench lokank visranchi prounnam aasaat, dekhun mhaka mhojim anubhavanche dharaar kaim sangonk di, mhaka Bharatachea raillean provas korchea uprant mell'lleant.

unnormalised: Poilem ticket book korunk. IRCTC website vo app tumchem asonk zai. Tatkal booking sokallim 10:00 vaztam AC classes-ank ani 11:00 vaztam non-AC-ank ugddaita. Mhaka visvas asa, tumchea sobhit details bhortat, hi ek sort! Agent-an koraitat zalear extra charges lagtat. Komitich komit 1-2 mhoine mukhar book korunk vichar kor, khas korun Diwali vo sumarachim suttieant. RAC/WL tickets sadaronn, punn tim punn nischit zataat.
normalised: Poileank ticket book korop. I-R-C-T-C website vo app tumchem margdarshak zaun asa. Tatkal booking sokallim dha vorancher A-C classesank ugta ani sokallim egar vorancher non-A-C-khatir. Mhaka visvas di, tumchi mahiti poilim bhortat maka tayar ravat, ti ek sort! Agentanlean karwaoge toh extra charges lagenge. Kami zaitari eak vo don mhoine poilim book korcheak vichar kor, khas korun peak seasonak jevvonn divllek vo sumerchea suttiek. R-A-C slash W-L tickets samanya, punn sadharon zaite pavtim confirm zataat.

unnormalised: Train-chea prakaranchi - Rajdhani ani Shatabdi soglleant vegim ani sukhichem, punn thorxe chodd daam asat. Duronto trains punn vegim, komi stanchim. Express trains kamache ghode, zati bhaganchi joddnni kortat, punn bhid zata. Local trains komi antarachean sheream bhitor borem. Tumi yad dovrat train no. 12345 veglli train no. 12321-an than.
normalised: Rail prakaranche vixim - Rajdhani ani Shatabdi vegim ani aramdaik zaun asaat, punn thoddi dhogaiik. Duronto railuy vegim asaat, komi sthagannantlean. Express rail karyakarta zaun asaat, zaitea xharank zoddtaa, punn garjeche asonk xaktaat. Local rail xharam bhitorem komi antrak lagun borem. Yaad tori dhor rail number bara hazar tinxim challis panch rail number bara hazar tinxim ekvisantlean veg-vegli.

unnormalised: Train-ancher jevonn ek mel misronn zata. Pantry cars borem jevonn ditat, punn gunnvatta badlata. Online jevonn order kor IRCTC e-catering-an than, tumchea lagim Domino's ani local restaurants tumchea seat-ak jevonn dovortat. Vo, tumchea sobit snacks ghetat - biscuits, chips, namkeen. Chai ek zai, sadaronn dor eka vorak mellta. Udka bottle-am visrum naka; daam sadaronn Rs. 20 dor ek.
normalised: Railantlem jevonn ek milxri asonk xakta. Pantry car utam jevonn divpak shaktat, punn gunnvattaa bodol zata. Online jevonn order kor I-R-C-T-C e-cateringachea zariyean, tumche kodden Dominos ani local restaurant-ank tumche seatak deliver korcheak options asaat. Vo, tumche svotaache snacks gheun voch - biscuits, chips, namkeen. Chai ek zai, lagbag dor ek vorak mellta. Udokachea bottlanchea vixim visar naka; kimti samanya rupiya vis dor ek.

unnormalised: Swachta ek prashn zata, khas korun sleeper class-an. Hand sanitizer ani ollsar wipes ghetat. Toilets sadaronn ghannttat, mhunn tanko sambhallun vaprat. AC coaches sadaronn swachh astat. Tumchea daamchim surakshit dovrat - tumchem luggage surakshit korunk lock ani chain vaprat. Tumchea sorovotticho dhyan di, khas korun ratrik.
normalised: Svachchta ek prashn asonk xakta zaite pavtim, khas korun sleeper class-ant. Hath sanitizer ani olle wipes gheun voch. Toilets zaite pavtim melle aasaat, dekhun tankam nyayin vaprav. A-C coach samanya nirmoll asaat. Tumchi moladik vostu surakshit dovrat - tumchem saman surakshit korcheak ek lock ani chain vaprav. Tumchea soroundingsank jaan ravat, khas korun raatchea vellar.

unnormalised: Joddnni korunk, mobile network thoddea zagaancher kam zata, khas korun graminchi zagaancher. Mukar filmam vo shows download kor mojeh khatir. Charging points zati coaches-an mellta, punn power bank ghetat jatan zalear. WiFi thoddea mukhya stanchim zagaancher mellta, punn sadaronn visvasnne zata. Tumi RailYatri App download korunk zanvo live train sthiti korunk; tem upyogi.
normalised: Connectivity-khatir, mobile network thoddea sthananchea sthanank patchy asonk xakta, khas korun grameen pradeshamant. Manornjonache khatir poilim-download korchea films vo shows. Charging points zaitea coaches-ant melltaa, punn power bank gheun voch fakt kosli-i ghatnaant. Wi-Fi kaim mukhya stations-an melltaa, punn hamesha visvasacho nhoi. Tumi live rail stithi sodpak RailYatri App download korunk xaktai; tem zaite upyogi zaun asa.

unnormalised: Lamb antarank ravtolim, AC coaches (2A vo 3A) book korunk prayatn kor zatiche sukh korunk. Sleeper class komi daam, punn bhid ani dadd zata. Ek nirdosh takiye ani kambal sambhallun dovrat, AC coaches-an punn, jea vellar tambmana badalta. Ek pustak vo magazine ghetat vell sarkho korunk. Tumchea sobit yatri sangati zata - tumi ruchik kotha aikunk zanvchi!
normalised: Lamb provasant provas kortanam, zait aramache khatir A-C coaches book korcheak prayatn kara (don A vo tin A). Sleeper class kamai, punn garjechem ani gollvollant zalear asa. Ek lhan ushako ani kamblo tayar dovrat, A-C coaches-anuy, kiteak temperan badal zata. Tempasar divpak ek pustok vo magazeen gheun voch. Tumchea sangelea provasyank bhov-ixhtt kor - tumi ruchicho zaiti khobro aikunk shaktati!

unnormalised: Shevottak, PNR sthiti niyemit check korunk yad dovrat booking keliat mukar â€“ vastu badlata, khas korun zatiche vell. Ani tumchea phone-acher ticket-ach kopy download korunk jatan zalear. Ani tumchea ID proof visrum naka (Aadhar Card, Voter ID, PAN card adik.). Ek surakshit ani khuxal rav Indian Railways-acher! Bharatantlea dekhnne ani avazichi mojh mazza ghetat!
normalised: Shevtim, booking korchea uprant P-N-R sthiti niyamit zanchunk yaad dovrat - vostu badalunk shaktat, khas korun peak vellamant. Ani tumchea phoneant tumchea ticketachi copy download kara fakt kitem ghoddta tem korta. Ani tumchem I-D proof visar naka (Aadhar Card, Voter I-D, P-A-N card vagera). Ek surakshit ani aanond bhoryacho provas Indian Railways-an asonk di! Bharatachea dristtant ani uchancho aanond gheiat!
